About

About

K.L. Schroeder is a speculative fiction writer, microbiologist, and aging goth forged by the dark winters of Canada and Sweden. They are a member of the Stockholm Writers' Group, the Canadian Science Fiction and Fantasy Association (CSFFA), Edinburgh Science Fiction & Fantasy (ESFF), and can also be found doing circus acrobatics.

Other places to follow their work:
